content: B 22-85 Nuron battery Versatile 22V Li-ion battery with optimal balance of weight, power and run time for use with Nuron power tools ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Batteries, chargers, and power stations- - - ### FEATURES:Features Better for your business – Nuron is a range of revolutionary batteries, tools and services to keep you productive, today and tomorrow Boost jobsite efficiency – new electronics provide insights on battery and tool use, empowering proactive tool crib optimization and troubleshooting before battery issues can affect productivity Upgraded durability and battery monitoring – built-in battery health tester, sealed electronics, shock absorbers and reinforced housing to better protect against jobsite conditions Applications Versatile 22V Li-ion battery with the optimum power-to-weight ratio for most everyday drilling, driving and cutting ### TECHNICAL DATA: Weight: 1.67 lb. Dimensions (LxWxH): 6.1 x 3.4 x 2.1 in Working temperature range: 1 - 140 °F Technical Data | Weight | 1.67 lb | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 6.1 x 3.4 x 2.1 in | Working temperature range | 1 - 140 °F ### ITEMS- 2251352 - Battery pack B 22-85 Li-ion Nuron - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x B 22-85 Li-ion Battery pack
